introduce.title: 소개
introduce.h1-2: I am Sumin Jeon, a developer who identifies and fulfills the needs of the user.
introduce.h2-1: Experienced in resolving user inconvenience through feedback implementation.
introduce.h3-1: After developing a platform for an in-school algorithm competition, I received feedback that the original leaderboard was not utilized effectively. Following the competition, I developed and integrated a real-time, individualized leaderboard to specifically address the participants' needs.
introduce.h2-2: Successfully implemented Sentry to enable rapid response for the Frontend team.
introduce.h3-2: As a Frontend Team Leader, I strived to alleviate the pain points experienced by team members. Recognizing that user inconvenience was directly linked to service quality, it was crucial to quickly identify errors. My implementation helped the team swiftly detect critical issues and minimized confusion regarding role distribution during sudden errors.

items.name: reflow
items.short: 데이터 보는 문화를 쉽게 만들어주는 서비스
items.details: 여기에 모달에 들어갈 상세 내용을 적습니다.
bullets: Google DORA 기반 팀 생산성 진단
데이터 소스 연결 및 BI 시각화
